alert.note: Alert for Bartholomew; Brown; Jackson; Johnson; Lawrence; Monroe; Morgan (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 26 at 12:53AM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Monroe, southeastern Morgan, southern Johnson, Brown, Bartholomew, northern Lawrence and Jackson Counties through 130 AM EDT... At 1253 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles southeast of Martinsville to 8 miles southwest of Nashville to 9 miles northwest of Bedford. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Bedford and Nashville around 100 AM EDT. This includes Interstate 65 between mile markers 51 and 79. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 300 AM EDT for south central and central Indiana.

area.areaDesc: Bartholomew; Brown; Jackson; Johnson; Lawrence; Monroe; Morgan
